sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
    v-container#domains
        v-layout(wrap column)
            v-flex(xs12)
                .title.text-xs-left.mb-4 Domains
            v-flex(xs12)
                v-card
                    v-card-title
                        v-layout(row align-center)
                            v-flex.px-2(xs12 sm6 md3)
                                v-text-field.pt-0.mt-0(v-model="searchText" append-icon="search" label="Search" single-line hide-details color="brown lighten-3")
                            v-spacer
                            v-btn(color="brown lighten-3" dark @click="addItem()") Add Domain
                    v-data-table.elevation-1(:headers="headers" :items="filterData" :search="searchText"  hide-actions )
                        template(slot="items" slot-scope="props" color="brown lighten-3")
                            tr
                                td.text-xs-left() {{props.index +1}}
                                td.text-xs-left() 
                                    .name.font-weight-medium {{props.item.domain_name}}
                                td.text-xs-left()  {{props.item.cname}}
                                td.text-xs-left
                                    v-btn.ma-0(flat icon small color="brown lighten-2" @click="editItem(props.item, 0)" title="edit domain" )
                                        v-icon(small) edit
                                    v-btn(color="brown lighten-2" dark small outline @click="goToSetting") More
                                            
                    v-layout.px-2(row align-center)
                        v-flex.text-xs-left.py-3(xs4)
                        v-flex.text-xs-right.py-3(xs8)
                            //- v-pagination(v-model="pagination.page" :length="pages" :total-visible="7" color="brown lighten-3")
                //- Dialogs
                v-dialog.edit-dialog(v-model="dialog.edit" max-width="460" persistent)
                    v-card
                        v-card-title.title Add Domain
                        v-card-text
                            v-form(ref="editForm")
                                v-text-field(v-model="domain.name" label="Name" type="text" name="name" color="brown lighten-3")
                                //- v-alert.text-md-left(:value="error.status" color="error" icon="warning" outline transition="scale-transition") {{error.message}}

                        v-card-actions  
                            v-spacer
                            v-btn(color="grey" flat="flat"  @click="closeEditDialog") Cancel
                            v-btn(color="brown lighten-3" flat="flat" ) Save
            
</template>


<script>
// import Table from "../components/Table";
export default {
    // components: { Table },
    data() {
        return {
            searchText: "",
            dialog: {
                edit: false,
                delete: false,
                password: false,
                otp: false
            },
            drawer: true,
            filterData: [
                {
                    domain_name: "www.hiero7.com",
                    cname: "www.mydomain1.com.shiftcdn.com"
                },
                {
                    domain_name: "www.yahoo.com",
                    cname: "www.yahoo.com.shiftcdn.com"
                },
                {
                    domain_name: "www.google.com",
                    cname: "www.google.com.shiftcdn.com"
                }
            ],
            headers: [
                {
                    text: "#",
                    align: "left",
                    sortable: false,
                    width: "80px",
                    value: "id"
                },
                {
                    text: "Domain Name",
                    align: "left",
                    sortable: true,
                    value: "domain_name"
                },
                {
                    text: "CName",
                    align: "left",
                    value: "cname",
                    // width: "100px",
                    sortable: true
                },
                {
                    text: "Action",
                    align: "left",
                    value: "",
                    width: "200px"
                }
            ],
            domain: {}
        };
    },
    watch: {},
    methods: {
        getAllDomains() {},
        addItem: function() {
            // this.$refs.editForm.reset();
            // this.userInfo = { user_group_id: this.userGroupId };
            this.editedIndex = -1;
            this.dialog.edit = true;
        },
        closeEditDialog: function() {
            this.dialog.edit = false;
            this.$store.dispatch("global/finishLoading");
        },
        goToSetting() {
            this.$router.push("setting");
        }
    },
    computed: {},

    mounted() {
        this.$router.push("/domains");
    },
    created() {
        this.getAllDomains();
    }
};
</script>

<style lang="sass" scoped>
.child-table
    tr  
        background-color: #F5F5F5
    tr:hover
        background-color: #E0E0E0 !important
</style>
